keywords.term: All is but a beginning : youth remembered, 1881-1901

revisionDesc.change: Weakly, Laura K. Added keywords and correspDesc

div1.p: I have just received a letter from Knox College Library which contains the following:

"The Knox College Library some twenty years ago acquired the assets of Bookfellow foundation, including the books and papers of George and Flora Seymour. Among these are over 70 letters from you to Mr. Seymour, birth and marriage announcements for your daughter Alice, and the text of a speech you delivered to the Bookfellows. I have just read with great interest and admiration your memoir, All is But a Beginning, and it occurred to me that you might be interested in having copies of these letters to Seymour as a reminder of later phases of your career, paricularly if you are contemplating further memoirs. I would be most happy to send them, if you so wish."
Would you be interested in having copies of these letters? If so, please let me know, and I will have them made.
